channel.title: [PI] Dragon Claws Emote [PI]
channel.description:
This is PROJECT INSANITY.
I do not know if it belongs here or the client section, because I have no idea how to fix. I have dragon claws hitting 4 times, but the animation is like in slow motion. I know many other people have had this problem before. Can someone help me out?

class20.java is client sided.

So look in your client folder…?

item.title: [PI] Dragon Claws Emote [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Love_me_plox Love me plox
item.description:
@Love_me_plox wrote:

In class20.java you should see

[code=java]if(j == 6000){int file = 1686;Class20 a = aClass20Array351[j];if(FrameStart[file] < 1)Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file);int[] framez = {75,75,62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73,65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74,79,90,90,94,94,58,0};a.anInt352 = frames.length-1;a.anIntArray353 = new int[framez.length-1];a.anIntArray354 = new int[framez.length-1];a.anIntArray355 = new int[framez.length-1];a.anInt363 = 0;a.anInt364 = 0;for(int i2 = 0; i2 < framez.length-1; i2++){a.anIntArray353[i2] = framez[i2];a…anIntArray354[i2] = -1;a…anIntArray355[i2] = 2; //[code]

Or something like it.

Where you see:

-1;a..anIntArray355[i2] = 2; //Decrease that and save and compile. It should speed up the timing. Hope this helps if you need any more assistance please let me know.

Read full topic
